ygData.subject: Re: Big update to the tinkering site
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I do enjoy the fact that someone was willing to share the secrets of that tinkering book with us. Now, on to your question about the quote you have posted:
ygData.messageBody:
>From: "Big Dave" <xceller@...>
>MWA HA HA HA!
>
>"There is no third book! You guys are wasting your time on trying to find
>it" - who said this recently?
>
>Boy, talk about famous last words. God I love it when things like this
>happen.

I do enjoy the fact that someone was willing to share the secrets of that
tinkering book with us.

Now, on to your question about the quote you have posted:

The person known as Joshua Bednarz said the quote, multiple times if I
remember correctly. This is also the guy that claims his little brother
posted as him, claimed to have gained supersecret important information
about tinkering, claimed to have communicated with important tinering
people, etc.

Trust this person no more. Everything he has said up to this point can be
considered falsehoods. I know not why he wasted the time of everyone on
this list, flooded their mailboxes with trash, or claimed to have any real
information whatsoever. If it indeed was a joke, his laugh upon us has
seriously backfired. To you, Joshua Bednarz, if that really is your real
name, I salute you for a job well screwed. I would hire you to work for the
other guy. I would ask you for a handshake, then say "too slow" and jerk my
hand away. I say "neener neener" to you and your descendants for 3
generations of twins. I wiggle my bum at thee. School children pass by and
snicker at you. You would fail as court jester. No one would come to your
hanging. When you go shopping, people hand you clues. When the waiter
gives you the check he says "oh, its you, nevermind". Girl scouts wouldn't
wash your car at Hardees. The gas station attendant won't give you the
bathroom key, even if you pay him. Dogs hump your leg at every bar and
dance club. Ugly women won't even date you.

You, sir, have been flamed. Burn for TTL= -1.

And now, for useful tinkering info.

There are 4 pieces from the gnomes in Solusek that might be logically useful
for tinkering: Small Power Source, Large Power Source, Functional Force
Module, Broken Force Module. The following combinations have failed to
produce anything:

Functional Force Module + Large Power Source
Broken Force Module + Small Power Source
Broken Force Module + Broken Force Module

You may ask why I tried such strange combinations but not a logical flow.
Well, the items don't load evenly. I have a lot of broken pieces, one or
two small power sources, and I used up the only functional force module and
large power source I had. So, if these really are tinkerable, it will prove
a pain to gather materials to use them.

Phenglei Kai, of Erollisi Marr
